Description:
Location and a relaxing lifestyle
What's the bet that this apartment matches all the criteria you have on your wish list! Location. Relaxing lifestyle. Low maintenance. Stylish. Ready for immediate occupancy with not a thing to do. Tick, tick, tick! Welcome to your new home. It is on the ground floor, with intercom entry and an automatic gate to the undercover car space. It is bright with white paintwork offset by mocha-coloured carpet and it has been presented to a high standard. Off the entrance hall is the spacious north facing living room, which has a door out to a balcony. The separate eat-in kitchen is easy to work in and comes with gas cooktop. The 2 bedrooms are well proportioned and have built-in wardrobes, while the bathroom includes laundry facilities. Close to Kilvington Grammar School and highly convenient to Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses, this property is also near reserves and recreation, with easy access to Monash Uni (Caulfield). Great for 1st or last homebuyers, this apartment would also make a super investment.
Conjunctional Agent: Advantage Property - Frank Valentic 0419 105 942
Insights: 2/38 Lillimur Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 2 bedroom unit in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
A Petit Retreat in a Convenient Location
Ready to go, this immaculate 1 bedroom 1st floor apartment enjoys the pick of positions in the building.
Nestled away at the front of the top floor, this modernised delight enjoys an open plan living & dining area with loads of glorious natural light.
With gas cooking, reverse cycle air conditioning, an up-dated electrical switchboard and beautiful hard wood timber floors the property is ready to lease out or move in as the perfect first home or investment.
Featuring a communal laundry and carport the building has been meticulously maintained.

Description:
Brilliant location, house-size appeal
Genuinely house size, but with the low maintenance qualities of a villa, this home has been handsomely styled to showcase its attributes. Polished timber flooring and a neutral decor add to the charm and brightness here and spacious rooms increase the relaxed liveability. Off the entrance hall, a huge living room has abundant natural light, a split-system A/C, and a sliding door out to a paved and plant-surrounded courtyard with abundant space for a barbecue. The kitchen (gas cooktop) adjoins the meals area. This is a 4-bedroom home - or 3 bedrooms (built-in wardrobes in 2, and a WIR in the master bedroom) plus a study! The master bedroom also has an ensuite, and there is a powder room in addition to the family bathroom. Ducted heating, security alarm and a double carport with storage is included. Situated in a tranquil tree-lined street, this property is on a bus route, with parks, reserves, local shops and recreation nearby, with Chadstone, trains, eateries, schools and Caulfield and Clayton campuses of Monash Uni in convenient distance.
Insights: 1/53 Leila Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Re-Do Re-Build Re-Invent Your Future in The McKinnon School Zone!
Situated just a short walk to McKinnon Secondary College and opposite McKinnon Primary School this charming period Californian Bungalow home ticks all the right boxes for a comfortable family home with scope for further renovation.
Behind this attractive facade there is loads of space for any growing family. Comprising: 3 living areas (formal lounge, spacious family room and a spacious retreat upstairs) with 4 large bedrooms.
Ducted heating, kitchen/meals area. Extra features include a separate formal dining room, large laundry and bathroom.
Outdoors a single lock up garage or workshop with ample off street parking all located on a large allotment of Approx 700 m2 (50 ft x 150 ft) adjoining acres of parkland/oval.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Description:
Brilliant Beginning, Astute Investment, Lifestyle Locale
Start, invest, lock and leave and live the easy life. Just 250 metres from Ormonds' transformed station and strip, a minute to E.E Gunn Reserve and an easy commute to Chadstone's retail therapy, this ground floor apartment makes the most of its north orientation with sun-lit lounge and dining flowing to a maintenance free courtyard.
Featuring stainless steel appliances and tiled splashback for the well-positioned kitchen and a fully tiled ensuite for the big double bedroom, this stylish start has perfect practicalities including built in robes, hardwood floors, fresh paintwork and undercover parking at the rear. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Carter Grange Quality on Display!
Find the best of brand new prestige living on display here! Built to Display Home standards at one of Ormond's most desirable addresses, this substantial four bedroom, 3.5 bathroom Carter Grange home perfectly utilises a super-deep site with expansive sun-bathed living flowing through stacking-sliders to a wide westerly deck ...and a big paddock-like backyard beyond.
A showcase of this leading builders' signature style with suites on each level (one a vast first-floor master), this exceptional home features an Ilve and glass-splashback kitchen, designer bathrooms (including two ensuites - one with dual vanity) and a cantilevered stairway beneath a soaring skylight. Finished to the highest standard with stone benchtops (even for the laundry), there's a large ground-floor powder-room and abundant storage including a walk-in pantry, dual-hanging walk-through robe and mirrored robes.
Appointed with ducted heating and cooling, an alarm, video intercom and additional Wi-Fi points, the home is 6 Star Energy rated with extensive double-glazing, LED lighting, solar hot-water and a fully-insulated garage door. Even the outdoors are on display with parking for at least three cars across a honed bluestone driveway and auto-garage and auto-irrigation front and rear. In a leafy locale within a few blocks of Ormond's shopping strip and new station, this showpiece home even has a choice of schools and the bus to the bay and Monash University within a walk.

Description:
Period Living, Large Proportions & a Prime Zone Position
A spectacular synergy of past and present where the aesthetic appeal of the era complement beautifully renovated spaces, this c1927 Californian Bungalow comes with great accommodation, prestige inclusions and arguably the best McKinnon College Zone location amidst a prized period streetscape.
Already extended up and out with an expansive up to five-bedroom, two-bathroom floorplan, the home combines period grace with the triple zone space that modern families love comprising formal rooms around a gas log fire, family living and dining in a big open plan and a first floor lounge easily adaptable as a 5th bedroom.
Resplendent with period detail including leadlight, a beautiful bay window and ceiling roses for the high ornate ceilings, the home features a state-of the art CaesarStone and Smeg kitchen, quality bathrooms, robe-fitted double bedrooms and Oak timber floors.
Set in 660sqm approx. of lush established gardens with a north facing BBQ retreat, pergola-shaded alfresco entertaining and a large workshop/studio at the rear, this fine family home enhances the easy life with ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a skylit study alcove, touch open cabinetry, easy access to under-stair storage plus outdoor shed and a large carport beyond off street parking.
Best of all, there's an in-demand, easy living location with all you need in close proximity - around the corner from North Road shops and station, a walk to Ormond Primary and Wattle Grove Reserve, minutes to McKinnon Village and Cosmopolitan Centre Road and Bayside's quick commute. ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.

Description:
Pretty as a picture
Possibly the prettiest home in the area, this beauty is presented to please. What a delight it is from the street, with its period charm, its impeccably maintained garden and its appealingly painted exterior. An entrance hall welcomes you in to an abode that definitely has that “home sweet home” ambience. Buffed and polished to a shine it has an entrance hall off which is the master bedroom where there is a box bay window (with plantation shutters), a mirror-fronted built-in wardrobe and an open fireplace (that can be hooked up to mains gas.) Both the second and third bedrooms also have BIRs. The bright bathroom features a clawfoot bath. French doors open to the side garden from the comfortable lounge room, which has a gas open fireplace. The kitchen (with stainless steel appliances and a gas cooktop) is adjacent to the dining area leading into a family room (with cathedral ceiling) and then seamlessly to the outdoor entertaining area that is fully covered and paved. It's a marvellous private party space with room for a BBQ and a large crowd of friends. Security alarm, ducted evaporative cooling, a 2nd toilet in the laundry, a reverse-cycle A/C, and a garage (accessed off Holloway Street) with automatic doors at both ends are included in this delightful property. On the corner of Holloway Street, the property sits on a compact, low maintenance allotment and is on the bus route, close to Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses, near reserves, parks, recreation, schools, and convenient to Monash Uni (Caulfield).
Clare Adams : 0432 640 642

Description:
An Oasis of Townhouse Beauty
Nestled in this premier development, this stylish 3 bedroom 2.5 bathroom town residence is a slice of heaven in gorgeous tropical seclusion. Supremely private, this idyllic retreat features beautiful Jarrah parquetry floors in the expansive open plan entertaining area, a sleek stone kitchen (900mm Euro stove, LG dishwasher, pantry), 3 double bedrooms (mirrored BIRs, main with WIR & modern ensuite), fitted study landing area, matching bathroom, fitted laundry and powder room. Featuring double glazed windows fitted throughout for added noise reduction.
The east-facing alfresco courtyard is finished with exposed aggregate and features lush Bamboo screening. Warm and inviting with its sophisticated colours, this lifestyle haven boasts ducted heating, evaporative cooling, internal access to an auto garage (storage) and a second car space.
One of 5 in the McKinnon Secondary College zone, metres to Ormond station, and a fabulous array of shops, cafes, restaurants and wine bars in North Road, walk to trendy McKinnon Village cafes, St Kevins Primary School, Ormond Primary School, Wattle Grove Reserve and the gorgeous Allnutt Park.

Description:
Tranquil, Low-Maintenance, In-Zone Living!
Meticulously maintained, beautifully presented and nestled at the far end of a long driveway, this two-bedroom single level villa is a ready-to-enjoy tranquil urban oasis. Appointed to an elite standard with an updated kitchen & bathroom accompanying two carpeted & robed bedrooms, a walk-through laundry, sunny private north-westerly courtyard featuring pavers underfoot for all-year entertaining...and optioned up to include timber floors, central heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning and a lock-up garage with internal courtyard access. Representing a perfect first home or investment close to Ormond Primary, in-zone McKinnon Secondary College, parks, shops & station, this is a high-quality, entry-level opportunity with an enviable lifestyle address.

Description:
Sitting Pretty in the McKinnon Secondary Zone
A warm and inviting family home blessed with delightful period character, charming formal spaces, quiet reflective places and the good grace to be located not only next to Ormond Primary but also within the McKinnon Secondary zone. Period appeal comes in the form of delicate leadlight, fetching parquetry, a magnificent marble fireplace, a classically themed ensuite to the restful master and the wonderful country style kitchen featuring timeless timber cabinetry, an integrated Liebherr refrigerator and a very impressive Rayburn Royal gas-fired, free-standing stove. Step out for covered outdoor entertaining on an extensive brick paved patio or otherwise find solace on a very special private verandah off the second bedroom, in the deep spa bath in the main bathroom, maybe in the sunroom style studio/study or simply sunning yourself in the north facing lawned garden. A third bedroom is blissfully zoned off, cosy up around a Jetmaster fire and appreciate ducted heating, evaporative cooling and plenty of room for the cars including a single garage, a carport for two and further parking beyond. You may even like to add your personal touch to this very pretty original sitting within attractive garden surrounds, only a walk to the fabulous McKinnon and North Road shopping strips and therefore Ormond and McKinnon stations as well.
Insights: 43 Murray Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 3 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Period beauty with a contemporary heart
Superbly renovated to give a contemporary edge to period beauty, this home is picture perfect, inside and out. What an appealing sight it makes from the street and what a big “wow” it earns for its stunning interior. From the wide planked floorboards to the bright white paintwork, from the high ceilings to the stylish presentation, from the generously proportioned rooms to the modern finishes and fittings, this is an outstanding home. The elegant formal lounge room is a great place for entertaining, as is the large open family room (split-system A/C)), which is awash with natural light and incorporates a brilliant kitchen with extensive use of Caesarstone, stainless steel Miele appliances, soft close drawers, and a breakfast bar. The outlook is to the private rear garden and outdoor entertaining area. The huge master bedroom (BIRs; window seat in bay window; ceiling fan) has a glamorous fully tiled ensuite. Two more bedrooms have BIRs and there is another chic bathroom, plus a large laundry. Among the extras are security alarm; approx 12sqm of storage in the ceiling above the laundry; shed; ducted heating; and 2-car carport. But that's not all - there's also a charming self-contained 1-bedroom bungalow, ideal for guest/in-law accommodation. The central location is in walking distance to the train station, buses, shops and cafes, with a reserve at the end of the street and recreational facilities, Kilvington and parks nearby.
Clare Adams : 0432 640 642

Description:
A Secluded Sanctuary of Warmth and Style
Stylishly renovated in private seclusion, this attractive 2 bedroom rear villa has everything you could want for lifestyle, living and relaxing.
Gorgeous with its stunning polished boards, this immaculate beauty features an entry hall, north facing living room, long galley style stone kitchen (Bosch appliances including ceramic cooktop, pyrolytic oven & dishwasher), 2 spacious bedrooms (one with fitted BIRs & desks, one with BIRs & bookshelf), separate toilet, chic bathroom and modern stone laundry.
The lush wrap around courtyard garden features a sail shaded alfresco deck and a large shed. One of only six, this idyllic retreat is complete with Crimsafe security doors, Rinnai gas heater, air conditioning, ceiling fan and auto garage.
Doors to North Road shops, cafes & restaurants, and just a heartbeat to the train, Monash Uni & Chadstone Shoppping Centre bus, Kilvington Grammar and the Katandra School.

Description:

A One Bedder Beauty with a Touch of Pizzazz
Open and airy with a sense of space and privacy, this beautifully renovated 1 bedroom ground floor apartment caters for all your needs. With breathtaking first impressions, this savvy starter features casual living & dining with sleek modern kitchen featuring stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher and induction cooktop), custom built cabinetry enclosing a family sized fridge and European laundry, spacious bedroom with room for a king sized bed (mirrored BIRs) and a vogue ensuite. Description:
Position, Prestige & Period Beauty in the McKinnon Zone
Put yourself in the heart of the McKinnon Zone with modern grace, family space and superb period beauty.
Positioned between Ormond and McKinnon's transformed shopping strip and station, this semi-detached, three-bedroom home extends over two sun-filled storeys with gas log-fire-warmed living and dining (ft. projector and automated drop down screen), a wall of built-in robes for the ground floor master and a luxe dual vanity bathroom against a detailed backdrop of high ornate ceilings, hardwood floors and a fine open fireplace.
Starring Blanco stainless steel appliances and glass splashback in the streamlined granite kitchen, a Euro laundry, surround sound and new light fittings throughout, this centrally heated and reverse cycle air-conditioned home even provides excellent emphasis on outdoor entertaining.... with lawn space for kids to play beyond a paved al fresco area in a north facing backyard.
Set in beautifully groomed gardens with an auto garage (ft. brand new cedar door) beyond exposed aggregate off street parking, this is period perfect living in a prized location - just moments to Joyce park and an easy commute to Mckinnon College, Valkstone, Ormond and McKinnon Primary Schools.
ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A CONTACT NUMBER.
Insights: 53 Murray Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 3 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Impressive in-Zone Easy Living!
Impressive, accommodating and set in the heart of the Zone, this is where easy family living meets educational opportunity. Individually street-addressed directly opposite McKinnon Primary School, this freestanding four bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, dual zone home offers the perfect family plan with formal living-dining facing a decked central courtyard, an expansive family zone opening to an extra-large north-facing paved courtyard, a first-floor master-suite (with WIR and ensuite)...even a bonus balconied area to fit a study nook!
Oriented to maximise north-west sun with wide windows upstairs and down, this sizeable centrally-heated streetfront home is big on appointments too - with elite European appliances including a Miele oven for the family-sized kitchen, an air-conditioner for the master and an alarm, solid Tasmanian Oak floors and quality window furnishings throughout. Even the outdoor space is opened up and sized out with a big double garage plus parking and a pretty lawned front yard in addition to the two courtyards.
Let the little kids cross the road to the Primary School, send the big kids off a few blocks to the Secondary College, get almost-adults to catch the bus along North Rd to Monash University...and give the whole family the benefit of this brilliant in-Zone address with parks, local shopping and a new kindergarten close!
Insights: 286 Tucker Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 4 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Divine Deco with Rare Zone Value
Count up the bedrooms (there are four plus a hidden study nook), tally up the bathrooms (two including an ensuite), add in the lovely living (two family-wise zones), multiply by impressive Art Deco beauty ... it all adds up to the best family value in the McKinnon Secondary College Zone.
Situated on an easy-access side road less than 500m from the back gates of the College, this substantial solid brick home offers an outstanding family lifestyle with a marvellous master-suite, fine formal lounge and expansive family living and dining around a quality appliance kitchen with Miele dishwasher. Rich with divine Deco detail including leadlight, decorative ceilings, newly polished hardwood floors and an impressive fireplace, the home also offers a wealth of contemporary comfort with ducted heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning and an abundance of storage including WIR and huge hall-storage.
Even the outdoors represent rare value with around 6,650sqft/618sqm of invaluable in-Zone land offering a covered al fresco area for entertaining, a secure garage for safe parking, a big backyard for kids to play and a vegie patch to harvest - all just a minute's walk to the newly transformed Ormond shopping strip and station.
Insights: 688 North Road, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 4 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
A Brilliant Opportunity!
Renovated ground floor 2 bedroom flat. Comprising of entrance hall, renovated eat-in kitchen with gas stove, spacious living room with reverse cycle air-conditioning, 2 bedrooms both with built in robes (one with reverse cycle air-conditioning), refurbished bathroom with shower over bath, washing machine facilities, separate toilet and carport. Walk to McKinnon Primary and Secondary schools, handy to Ormond and McKinnon stations and shopping centres. Currently leased to excellent tenants on a monthly tenancy.

Description:
Gracious Family Space in the Zone
Period grace meets today's family space in one of the McKinnon Secondary College Zone's premier streets. Beautifully extended to offer a thoroughly contemporary triple zone floorplan, this exceptional four bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home is graced with fine formal lounge and dining rooms (one easily reconfigured to offer a fifth bedroom or home-office), sun-filled family living extending to a soaring al fresco area, and a fan-cooled first-floor lounge as part of the kids' level.
Featuring a quality stainless-steel appliance kitchen and classic bathrooms (including an ensuite) and generous storage (with walk-in and built-in robes plus roof and hallway storage), this accommodating in-Zone home features ducted heating plus reverse-cycle air-conditioning, a beautiful open-fireplace and an auto-gated double garage plus plentiful parking ...all set in around 7750sqft/720sqm gardens with room to play and vegie boxes to harvest!
Just 250m from the back gates of the College, even closer to the bus to Monash University, and a walk to the revitalised Ormond shopping strip and station, this is impressive family living in the heart of the Zone.
Insights: 46 Draper Street, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 4 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.
